frontmatter.title: Jira Service Desk Operator
frontmatter.subtitle: Collaborative and visual infrastructure as code for Jira Service Desk Operator
frontmatter.howItWorks: Configure and customize Jira Projects and Issues
frontmatter.howItWorksDetails: Automate the process of setting up the Jira Service Desk (JSD) operator configuration of alertmanager in a Kubernetes native way.
featureList: Teams can track issues, manage projects, and automate workflows.
Configure Issues - abstract away use a Jira's REST API in it's underlying layer and extend to perform other tasks that are supported via the REST API.
Manage Projects - Manage customer and organization for projects.
